items.summary:

It dropped to the $590 mark for the first time earlier this year in February, which it recently hit during the fall Prime Day sale as well, but today’s deal shaves an additional $10 off to mark a new best price to beat. The 16GB RAM/256GB SSD variant of this laptop is also discounted down to $679 at Best Buy right now, down from its usual price of $800. Head below for more details.

items.title: Here’s how to score $1,000 savings on EcoFlow’s upcoming DELTA Pro Ultra X power station
items.summary:
Right alongside its ongoing Prime Day Sale that has been extended through October 15, EcoFlow has launched the super early-bird savings promotion for its upcoming DELTA Pro Ultra X Whole-Home Power Station (1 inverter and 2x batteries) ahead of its release on November 3, 2025. At this time, pricing information is surprisingly limited, with the brand simply offering the deal of a $500 deposit made between now and November 2, scoring you a $1,000 discount upon its launch from November 3 to November 30. The predecessor model carries a $6,098 tag at full price, with it regularly keeping under $5,000 most of the time, so it’s safe to say that this new model’s MSRP will land somewhere around those rates. Along with the initial discount, the brand is also promising up to $1,000 in installation subsidies when grabbing the station bundled with the brand’s new Smart Home Panel 3. Head below to learn more about this all-new backup power solution.

When building out a custom M4 Mac mini configuation from Apple, you can only go as high as 2TB, and the company wants $800 to do it. While it sports a $170 MSRP, you’ll more regularly find it floating around $130 at full price since its newer third-generation model released, with discounts having gone as low as $95 over the year, which last popped up back during July’s Prime Day event. Last week’s Prime Big Deal Days event kept things at $100, but now you can score it back at the annual low for the second time ever. The deal gives you a 27% markdown off the going rate (44% off the MSRP), cutting $35 from the tag here, and saving you a total $75 off the MSRP that you would pay elsewhere, for another shot at the best price of 2025.
